author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1656848434}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11207, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1703071317}
review:
Fair Strike is an ancient game from 2004.  It's a whopping 19 years old at the time of this review.  The game lacks support for any modern gaming display resolutions (or widescreen monitors), hasn't been modernised or updated to run smoothly on modern gaming PCs.  Despite this lack of modernisation, it carries a pretty high price tag for such an ancient game.  This seems to have been put on Steam as a nostalgia gouge, or just a cash grab to try profit from abandonware.

This is an old simulator-esque arcade game featuring Russian helicopters.  The quality of the game is wonderfully proportional to the quality of Russian military equipment... garbage. 

From a technical perspective, the game doesn't meet basic minimum requirements that most PC gamers expect as standard.

The developers have done nothing to adapt the game for modern gaming PCs, as such the display resolution caps out at around 1200p, there's no support for the state-of-the-art 4K or higher resolutions.  The game simply won't look right on modern gaming displays due to this failure on the part of the developers.  The game only displays in 4:3 pillarboxed aspect ratio, due to the age of the game, it predates the 16:9 widescreen gaming standard established back in 2006.  It's possible they're marketing this towards people using an old CRT they found in a dumpster, or this game is being specifically marketed towards people gaming on PC's from 1995... either way, this isn't really acceptable in the modern era of PC gaming.  It's obviously not going to look right on a modern 16:9 gaming display.

The controls can't be customised, which will be an annoyance for many, but it can also render the game unplayable for differently-abled gamers, or gamers using AZERTY or other international keyboard layouts.  

These technical defects push this game below acceptable standards for any modern PC game.

Reviewing SteamDB to check how popular this game was with players reveals a surprise... there's a very healthy spike in player counts for the game.  But this only happened once, around the same time that trading cards were applied to the game... so this is just card idlers getting their cards and moving on.  A closer look at the numbers shows the game just has a couple of players every week running up the game and idling it for cards, then deleting it.  We must ask how it benefits gamers for there to be so many games like this, with no merit as a serious game, that only generate sales from people idling and selling the trading cards.

Fair Strike is relatively expensive for an abandonware nostalgia gouge, at $4 USD, and it's not worth it.  The game is just too old, hasn't been modernised.  And as the old saying goes, you can't go home again.  Even when it was new, this was never a triple-A game.  This is the kind of game that went almost directly from the warehouse into the cheap bargain bins at the front of the shop.  Now, on Steam, without any modernisation?  This is impossible to recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198402588414', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1696583884}
review:
Fair Strike, despite its antiquated design, offers a compelling blend of entertainment and realism for those who relish the experience of piloting a helicopter through enemy territory alongside their unit while completing diverse objectives. The standout feature of this product lies in its robust customization options for helicopter units, allowing players to tailor both appearance and weapon loadouts. Additionally, the game presents a wide array of enemy types, each a source of satisfaction to obliterate using a combination of hellfire missiles and machine gun torrents.

While it's worth noting that ammunition is limited and reserved for specific enemy units, Fair Strike balances this challenge by generously providing refueling stations. These stations not only replenish ammunition but also restore the health of your helicopter, ensuring that players can stay engaged in the action. If you have a penchant for attack helicopter simulators, whether they are older or more recent, or if you simply enjoy the appeal of straightforward yet entertaining video games that test your navigational and tactical skills, then purchasing Fair Strike is a decision well worth considering.

review:
Old but solid attack helicopter Simcade. It is an action game where you complete counter terrorist missions in different helicopters.
The game runs fine as long as you don't change the resolution for some reason.
Controls are also a little wonky and I couldn't seem to change them.

Overall an old interesting game worth its price.

review: chinese plz. 中文请出。run good for now pc. 希望适配现今的电脑。202211下，t a o宝，支付宝红包，杉果，本平台，本平台充值折扣掉卡，indie gala，fanatical，humble，daily indie game，loot boy，它处自定义包入的本体约3元。爱人如己，目前就这，看以后追评。有中文的游戏请耐心自研体验乐趣，攻略指南尽量不用。不建议使用外挂，插件，作弊之类的，游戏都要这样搞，那现实里那更是如此了。兄弟萌，强烈建议不要第三方平台的小店买y u额，通过饰品等挂steam市场转的，高概率red信乃至封号，且行且珍惜。

author: {'steamid': '76561198201246082', 'num_games_owned': 3232, 'num_reviews': 1499, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1656160015}
review:
Fair Strike, terörizm ve uyuşturucu kaçakçılığına karşı savaşan cesur pilotların modern saldırı helikopterleriyle yürüttüğü bir savaş oyunudur. Oyuncuların amacı, dünya çapındaki terörizmle savaşmak ve tüm kötü adamları yok etmektir. Oyun, 2000'lerin başlarında oldukça yaygın olan savaş uçuş simülasyonu türünden bir örnektir.

Fair Strike'da, sıkıcı ve tekrar eden görevlerin olmadığı bir oyun deneyimi sunulur. Oyuncular, barışçıl vatandaşları rahatsız eden kötü adamların üzerine öfke ve öfke ile saldıracaklar. Oyunun amacı basittir: tüm kötü adamları öldürmek!

Oyunun farklı helikopterlerinden 6 tanesi oynanabilir: AH-64A Apache, RAH-66 Comanche, PAH-2 Tiger, Ka-50 Black Shark, Ka-52 Alligator ve Ka-58 Black Ghost. Oyuncular, Karayipler'deki ağır silahlı uyuşturucu teröristleri, Doğu Avrupa'daki ayrılıkçıları ve Güneydoğu Asya ve Ortadoğu'daki Müslüman fundamentalistleri yeneceklerdir. Oyunda, ekrandaki her şey yıkılabilir: düşman tankları, tankerleri, sığınakları, gemileri, helikopterleri ve askerleri.

Oyunun grafikleri oldukça iyi ve oynanabilirlik açısından tatmin edicidir. Oyun, farklı seviyelerde ve zorluklarda oynanabilir. Ayrıca, oyunun müzikleri de oyun deneyimini destekleyen kaliteli bir özelliktir.

Ancak, oyunda bazı problemler de mevcuttur. Oyunun kontrol sistemi, biraz karmaşık olabilir ve bazı oyuncular için zorlayıcı olabilir. Ayrıca, bazı görevler zor olabilir ve oyuncuların sabrını test edebilir.

Genel olarak, Fair Strike, savaş uçuş simülasyonu türündeki oyuncular için keyifli bir seçenektir. Farklı helikopterleri kullanarak çeşitli görevleri tamamlamak ve dünya çapındaki terörizme karşı savaşmak heyecan verici bir deneyim sunar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056812873', 'num_games_owned': 1135, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1674848453}
review:
[h1] Игра детства, которую не пожалело время [/h1] 
Вы не представляете, насколько сильные приятные эмоции я испытал, когда всего-навсего запустил [u]«Ударную силу» 2004 года[/u] выхода. От перешакаленного вида меню мне стало тепло на душе, а когда запустилась сама игра, радости не было предела. «Ударная сила» — это одна из немногих игр на ПК, в которые я играл в дошкольном возрасте, помнится, примерно в 2008 году. В свое время я затер её до дыр, и даже сейчас спустя почти 15 лет за секунды понял, куда лететь – а руки-то помнят! Но почему же тогда негативный обзор?

К моему величайшему сожалению, только из-за текущего состояния данной версии игры, которое абсолютно неудобоваримо. Вряд ли справедливо даже за небольшую цену продавать старенький проект, который еле-еле запускается на современных системах. Я не отнёсся серьезно к проблемам этой версии, бомбить тут, я думаю, можно много. Вот некоторые из проблем, с которыми я столкнулся:
[list]
    [*] Игра не даёт сменить разрешение. При попытке это сделать – просто выключается, но при новом запуске так ничего и не меняется.
    [*] Нельзя настроить управление. Я, конечно, полетал с предустановленным, но без устоявшегося WASD играть сейчас крайне непривычно.
    [*] В игре отсутствует музыка. Крайне хорошая, насколько мне не изменяет память. Она отлично создавала атмосферу старого военного боевичка категории B.  
    [*] За пол часа игры три критических вылета.
    [*] Сохранения не работают, из-за чего вы будете снова и снова проходить первую миссию.
[/list]

Всё это помешало мне насладиться игрой. А поверьте, насладиться там есть чем, хотя вряд ли большинство будет испытывать столь тёплые чувства, что и я. Рассказать об игровом опыте у меня получится только с учётом изменчивой памяти. Здесь вас ждёт приятное управление различной воздушной техники, преимущественно советских вертолётов. Бороздя воздух боевыми летательными аппаратами, вы пройдете пять кампаний по несколько постепенно усложняющихся уровней. До сих пор помню тамошний саунд-дизайн, который и сейчас, наверное, слушается недурственно с учетом малого количество игр про военные вертолеты за последние 10 лет.

Ещё стоит отметить, что игра не имеет ничего общего с серией Strike (где Desert Strike и т.д.) Само название Fair Strike, показывающееся на странице Steam, вообще экспортное. В СНГ использовалось только «Ударная сила».

[b]Я получил свою дозу ностальгии. Но не от самой игры в Steam, а от воспоминаний. Сейчас же «Ударная сила» – серый непричесанный и практически не работающий кусок старого кода. Я не требую, чтобы игру ремастерили или прилизывали. Всё-таки это не проект того уровня. Но я бы был этому премного рад. Сейчас покупать игру нет никакого смысла. [/b]

[h1] Фанаты, одумайтесь. Игра нерабочая. Следовательно, покупать и плодить халтуру не стоит. [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198347791795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 478, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1656526260}
review:
Fair Strike is a really meh game. Its an old game and, fortunately, it actually works as soon as you install it. You'll just have to get used to the low resolution and the controls. Fortunately you can change the controls. Unfortunately whenever you exit the game the keybindings specifically will go back to their default keybindings which means when you launch the game again you'll have to redo all your keybindings. Its not a major issue but it can get annoying.

+Surprisingly there is a lot of helicopters that you can play. Russian and Western helicopters.
+Each helicopter has a cockpit of its own. You can look around, change a few of the screens its actually really cool.
+You can change your helicopters weapons. Guided missiles, unguided rockets and anti-air missiles are the only options you have. The cool part is Russian helicopters use Russian ordanance while the Western helicopters use Western ordanance.
+A good number of missions to do. Each mission has main and side objectives. There have been a few times where i failed a mission because i was too slow i think? So you do need to be fast in certain missions.
+There is a multiplayer game mode however from what i could see there are no servers available. But you can play with bots instead!
+There is a simulator and an arcade option. Simulator option gives you a bit more control over your plane while arcade is well arcade-ish really.

+/- The voice acting is really meh.
+/- You may need to redo your keybindings each time you start the game.

-The missions are really meh. There is a good number of missions but god damn sometimes they are really boring.
-The game gets repetative way too quickly.

Its a really meh game. For its full price, 8 Turkish Lira, i definitely won't recommend it. I got it in a discount for like 1 TL so i was fine with it. The game has some really cool stuff in it the helicopters are cool, there is quite a few of them, they all have their own unique cockpits, the choices for weapons are similar and simple but the fact that Russian helicopters use Russian weapons while Western ones use Western weapons is a nice little touch. But aside from the helicopters the gameplay is just... Too boring. Its too repetative and too simple. If you are interested you could buy it in a discount but definitely don't pay full price for it its not that good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314652726', 'num_games_owned': 1475, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1641159232}
review:
Будучи юным и перспективным мне и моим друзьями понравилась эта игра. 
Однако проходят годы…
Словив в очередной приступ молодости покупаю её заного и что я вижу?

Месиво из пикселей, ибо за эти годы разрешение средних экранов увеличилось примерно в 2 раза.

Унылый геймплей: уничтожь 
 а,б,в; сопроводи что-то куда-то. 

Проблемы с ориентацией, ибо игра делалась давно, то в ней лишь белые, нигеры и азиаты, а смысл? Игра про attack hekicopter-ы и наркоимперии, люди в ней излишни… Да и с обычной ориентацией проблемы: карта зависит от вертолёта, если миссия с выгрузкой, то либо прыгаешь со стула от крика о возможной высадке, либо подлетаешь к каждому красному квадратику и ждёшь, пока энписи соизволит доставить груз…

Союзники, которым сказано следовать за вами будут всячески пытаться спрятаться за вашей спиной, но, в отличии от некоторых игр, будут действительно убивать
Враги, к ним нареканий нет: увидят - попытаются тр@хнуть.

Выполнил все основные и неосновные миссии на тяжёлом уровне сложности, когда до этого в настройках ставил нормальный - молодец, держи одну звезду, пэдики, где ещё 3 звёзды?

Игра имеет разные названия и разные цены в разных регионах, здесь явно замешаны евреи…

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3717, 'playtime_forever': 6152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6152, 'last_played': 1646197731}
review:
《Fair Strike》这款声称将策略与飞行模拟相结合的作品，尽管立意新颖，却并未完全兑现其承诺，反而暴露出一些显著的问题，使得不少玩家感到失望。

首先从视觉体验上看，图形表现略显平庸。尽管宣传中强调了其画面真实度和场景细节，但实际上，游戏的纹理质量并不理想，飞行模型及环境交互显得粗糙，尤其是相较于同类竞品，其在光影效果和物理模拟方面的不足尤为明显，无法有效营造出沉浸式的空战体验。

其次在核心玩法上，战略元素设定虽有创新理念，但实际操作中却呈现出复杂而不直观的一面。游戏的任务设计缺乏足够的引导，让初次接触的玩家难以快速上手，同时空中打击战术的选择与实施过程繁琐而不自然，往往需要面对过于复杂的界面和晦涩的操作流程。

再者游戏中的AI智能程度不高，不论是敌方单位还是友军支援，行为模式过于单一且预测性过强，严重降低了游戏的挑战性与真实性。此外武器系统的多样性看似丰富，实则在实际游戏中感觉重复度较高，缺少独特性的战术选择空间。

另一方面，技术稳定性也是困扰本作的一个痛点。不少玩家反映游戏存在频繁的bug和技术问题，包括但不限于卡顿、崩溃以及在线匹配机制的不完善，这无疑影响了整体的游戏流畅度和用户体验。

最后社区反馈的响应速度及更新频率亦不尽人意。虽然开发团队表示会听取玩家意见并作出改进，但实际进度缓慢，许多已知问题迟迟未得到解决，这也让部分忠实玩家逐渐失去耐心和信心。

总结来说，虽有其独特的设计理念，但在实际执行中未能充分展现优势，反而因诸多技术问题和设计缺陷导致游戏体验大打折扣。对于期待一款深度策略与精准模拟空战结合的玩家来说，目前的状态恐怕难以达到预期，有待开发团队深入优化与迭代升级。

author: {'steamid': '76561198086667710', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1719, 'last_played': 1636766968}
review: Отличная вертолётная игрушка , помню когда то играл ещё в школе когда был , многое было не понятно , но сейчас мне 32 и в этой игре хоть нет толком обучения , но удовольствие от игры получить можно , особенно если играли в Operation flashpoint , есть разные настройки игры , можно как на симуляторе кучу параметров настроить , а можно адаптировать под мышь и клавиатуру и не напрягаться особо в плане управления , в игре разные вертолёты под разные задачи и стили игры так сказать , если следовать приказам и правильно руководить ведомыми то игра работает норм , на 1, 2, 3 команды ведомым , игра интересная и сложная , есть у вертолётов свои особенности , но мне очень вертолёты нравятся , если вам тоже то получите удовольствие от игры , графика приемлемая , местами ностальжи )

author: {'steamid': '76561198815748328', 'num_games_owned': 2991, 'num_reviews': 710, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1633105971}
review:
It literally says "don't waste your time" in the product description.
So unpopular it doesn't even have any workarounds documented in https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Fair_Strike
I got it because I love Kamov's coaxial rotor and bathtub armor, but this game will take a lot of work to get it from "crashes when I try to set the video resolution" all the way to "actually fun".
I think I'll just go replay ARMA3's chopper missions instead.

PS: it's weird how the Crossout / War Thunder / IL-2 people never shipped [url=https://www.gaijinent.com/en/games/apache/]Apache: Air Assault[/url] on the steam...
That was fun and absurdly hard to play two-player local co-op (one pilot, one gunner).

author: {'steamid': '76561198218510948', 'num_games_owned': 406, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1624767354}
review:
Fair Strike es un simulador de vuelo de helicópteros de combate arcade.

Lanzado originalmente en 2004 y que admite una resolución máxima de 1280 x 960 a 32 bits de profundidad. Sin embargo, el juego funciona y se reproduce sin problemas en el núcleo i7 y NVIDIA GT 770 bajo Windows 7 de 64 bits.

Mirando más allá de los gráficos obviamente anticuados, el juego es divertido. Los controles predeterminados tardaron un poco en acostumbrarse, pero son funcionales y en su mayor parte utilizables. Esté preparado para dominar el uso de un controlador X-box inalámbrico junto con el mouse y el teclado. Hay 7 páginas de teclas de control / configuraciones predeterminadas para memorizar y el juego no se puede jugar sin tenerlos bajo tu pulgar, por así decirlo.

Las misiones son bastante sencillas con misiones principales y misiones secundarias que deben completarse y objetivos y logros adicionales.

Hay cartas coleccionables de Steam y logros de Steam que se pueden ganar y el juego es divertido y desafiante. Tenga en cuenta que la configuración predeterminada del juego es Difícil. Hay otras dos configuraciones disponibles, Normal y Fácil.

Hay una variedad de armas y ordenanzas, y algunos helicópteros militares rusos icónicos que han sido modelados razonablemente bien.

Este juego se mantiene bastante bien con otros juegos similares disponibles en el momento de su lanzamiento original, como la serie Apache Longbow.

Si bien no es un simulador de vuelo de última generación, este juego está lejos de ser un puro juego de arcade. Caería en algún lugar entre los dos. La mejor descripción sería un simulador de vuelo de combate con elementos arcade.

Las misiones son divertidas de jugar, pero son una fantasía exagerada con un toque melodramático sólido. Todos los carteles de la droga en el mundo se han unido en esta superorganización criminal que es más fuerte que las organizaciones militares de las superpotencias militares combinadas del mundo. Sin embargo, esto proporciona mucha carne de cañón y objetivos de bombardeo, ¡así que muchas cosas para disparar y explotar!

Un juego competente que proporcionará varias horas de diversión a un precio económico.

5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198359579259', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1522579561}
review: Вот и наступило время твоего испытания. Этот момент когда-нибудь должен был наступить. Для боя ты и рожден. Ну что, дорогой, грустно? Мне тоже грустно. Вот так бывает с каждым, кто покидает родной дом. Ты взрослеешь, это твое первое дело. Я знаю, ты справишься. Многое ты уже делаешь лучше, чем другие.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123473789', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1477811234}
review:
It's worth the price for nostalgia alone. It's a very old Nuclear Strike,Soviet Strike clone. If you remember those games you may like this. It is buggy and clunky,I wish there was a modern(2017) remake of this remake (2004)with updated graphics and sound.I am recommending this because this genre has nothing like it on steam,Although, it doesn't run well on my modern machine. 4790k, 2 gtx 970's  sli, 16G, resolution is not up to todays standard of 1920x1020.
 We need to bring games like this back into mainstream gaming.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017381708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1488230786}
review:
Хотелось вспомнить детство и бездумно пострелять. Но не вышло.
Из 10 минут игры могу сделать след выводы:
1. на резрешении 1024 процесс вылетает с ошибкой (вин10)
2. после перезапуска не сохраняются настройки управления
3. управление оч сложное, будто не аркада, а симулятор
4. неинформативная карта

А задумка офигенная.
В итоге потратил 10 минут, отдал 100 ру, удовольствия никакого

review: I expected a outdated arcade shooter. For the  3.00 that was to be expected. What I didn't realize is that it's impossible to play via the control setup.  Xbox joystick, only a couple functions work - then it wants mouse and keyboard.  I'll try again - as something must have been wrong?   so far I can't recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041603555', 'num_games_owned': 1621, 'num_reviews': 454, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1429944610}
review:
Fair Strike is ancient, and it shows. Limited resolution, too many buttons, lack of full support for gamepad, it adds up to a somewhat frustrating flying experience when you just want to blow **** up. 

One would have hoped that whoever made it run on modern platforms (it does run fine on Win7x64) would have bothered to create a decent mapping for gamepad, but no luck here. Game doesn't want to map a lot of commands, and have no way of figuring on which control is which. For example, let's say you want to map the two triggers to shoot... nope, can't do that. Those are ANALOG controls. ARGH! Okay, map to "rudder" (left right turns). Go into the game... It's REVERSED! I hit left and I turn RIGHT! had to go into options/controls and turn on "INVERTED". Do this for EVERY analog control. Oh, and it doesn't support the digital pad. 

I guess I could have opened up XPADDER and tried to remap some more commands, but I'm too tired fighting with the game rather than playing it. 

Being an ancient game even on older machine frame rate is silky smooth. And graphics are decent. Sound is okay. 

The main problem is the game doesn't quite seem to make of itself. Being a "Strike" series member, Fair Strike is trying to invoke some old shooters like Desert Strike, Jungle Strike, and so on, but those are isometric and semi-3D shooters. This is a full 3D arcade-y flight sim.  It'd be the difference between original River Raid and Lock-On. There's even a "simulation controls" (with full cyclic and collective controls) if you find the arcade controls (almost like hovercraft) too limiting. 

If you want a fun helo shooter, go play Thunderwolves instead. This game is a bit too old and quirky to be enjoyable nowadays.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048574801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 518, 'last_played': 1429880835}
review:
Fair Strike is an arcade combat helicopter flight simulator.

Originally released way back in 2004 and supporting a maximum resolution of 1280 x 960 at 32 bit depth.  The game does however work and plays smoothly on the core i7 and NVIDIA GT 770 under windows 7 64-bit.

Looking past the obviously dated graphics, the gameplay is fun.  The default controls took a little time to get used to, but are functional and for the most part usable.  Be prepared to master using a wireless X-box controller in tandem with the mouse and keyboard.  There are 7 pages of default control keys / settings to memorise and the game is not playable without getting these under your thumb so to speak.

The missions are fairly straight forward with main missions and side missions to be completed and bonus objectives and achievements.

There are Steam trading cards and Steam achievements to be earned and the game is both fun to play and challenging.  Be warned that the default game setting is Hard.  There are two other settings available, Normal and Easy.

There are a variety of weapons and ordinance, and a few iconic Russian military helicopters which have been reasonably well modelled.

This game stands up fairly well with other similar games available at the time of it's original release such as the Apache Longbow series.

While not a state of the art flight simulator, this game is far from being a pure arcade game.  It would fall somewhere in between the two.  Best description would a combat flight simulator with arcade elements.

The missions are fun to play, but are a little over-the-top fantasy with a solid melodramatic touch.  All the drug cartells in the world have united into this super criminal organisation which is stronger that the military organisations of the world's combined military super powers.  This does however provide lots of cannon fodder and bombing targets so lots of stuff to shoot and blow up!

A competent game that will provide several hours of fun at a budget price.

5 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198056743268', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1429827455}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028150018', 'num_games_owned': 478, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1429816630}
review: [i]"Лучший 3D-ускоритель - это наше воображение".[/i] Долой современные видеокарты и процессоры! Возвращаемся в 90-е, где нас ждет теплый "ламповый" вертолет в 33 полигона, мудрёное управление которым заткнет за пояс передовые симуляторы. :) Не. Если честно, при желании удовольствие от игрового процесса получить можно. Для этого нужно вспомнить какую-нибудь игру из серии Comanche, глотнуть чего-нибудь "горячего", и перестрелять весь боекомплект в перемещающиеся по экрану квадраты, воображая себе как злодеи, завидя на горизонте грозное винтокрылое создание, бегут прочь, спотыкаясь о неровности ландшафта. Вердикт: если не обделен фантазией - то можно полетать от нечего делать. В любом случае, это что-то "новое" да еще и с русской озвучкой. ;)
